name: Out of Place (CodyHadden)
description:
Out of Place is a VR experience where the player starts in a seemingly normal hallway. As the player progresses further into the experience, some things feel "out of place" as items slightly change from where they originally were, further into the experience the player is the one who will feel out of place.

The player will need to observant if they want to notice the changes throughout the experience 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls (Quest 2)

Left Controller Joy Stick - Change camera position
Right Controller Joy Stick - Teleport Player
Both Controllers - Can pick up items

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Play Tested on a Quest 2

With PC Specs

Ryzen 9 3950X
Galax  RTX 3080 TI
32 GB Ram
